review: Good value for the price. I love the variety of apps and games you have to choose from. It's easy to switch it to another tv as needed. The remote is simple and the menus are easy to navigate (my 4 year old has no problem!). It's a great method of streaming media if you're not quite ready to upgrade to a smart tv.
